title: Blood, Flesh, Bones Sound Pack 1
description: A collection of sounds for War, Battlefield, Medieval Weapon, Fighting, Horror - wherever blood is poured, bones are crushed and battle is fought. The package contains 300 sound effects.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/blood-flesh-bones-sound-pack-1

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/q5dbhvlpir8b5as/MSE%20-%20Blood%2C%20Flesh%2C%20Bones%20Sound%20Pack%201_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


The package contains 300 sound effects, including 136 audio files of blood, flesh, gore and 164 audio files of bones, flesh, crunches.


Use this asset to voicing damage and pain of characters and enemies, cause injuries, accompany gunfire, stabbing and slashing sounds, battle sounds in fighting games, for gameplay sounds in horror and fantasy.


The sound pack is also great for monster movement, mutation and transmutation. The sounds of blood, flesh, bones and crunches can be used to move slime, worms, spiders, swamp creatures, the birth of aliens, the appearance of demons, zombies, skeletons, or use these sound effects to create sound for individual game events.


You can also mix sound effects with each other to create even more sound variations.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 300 sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 136 audio files of blood, flesh, gore
  • 164 audio files of bones, flesh, crunches
  • great for all kinds of Wars and Battles
  • good for monster mutations and movement
  • perfect for RPGs, Fighting, Horror, Fantasy, Dark Fantasy genre


Number of Audio Waves: 300

Number of Audio Cues: 300

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 08 minutes 38 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
